trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Clearwater
There was one other sighting in Clearwater on or around August 9th 2013
divs: sighting detailson two different nights approx 5 nights apart i have seen something i can not explain. on both nights i saw what at first glance appeared to be a star at approx. the 10:00 position in the sky and wnw of my location. on both occasions the star was in about the same position in the sky. while looking at the star i could see the top part change from white to red and then change back to white very quickly. at times i could also see a blue\green light on the right side of the star that again would change back to white very quickly. during the time i watched it ( approx. 15 minutes ) it never changed position in the sky which pretty much rules out a plane. i am 64 years old and was sober and wide awake on both occasions. i would love to hear a scientific explanation of this phenomenon.
